title: Outlook: Reset people suggestions in Outlook search for GCC and DoD
description: This feature will allow users to reset, export, and/or opt out of people suggestions in search through settings in the Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. When a reset is done, all versions of Outlook will reflect the change. This feature is already available in worldwide multitenant and will now be available for customers in GCC and DoD. #newoutlookforwindows
